name: FallMönsch 3D (AI Multiplayer + 7 Gamemodes)
description:
Hello everybody, FallMönsch is a similar game to fall guys (A nice game from Mediatonic).
There are 7 known game modes and computer controlled opponents.
⠀
All Gamemodes:
-Obstacle run
-Dropper
-DoorTime
-Knock Knock
-Hex-A-Gone
-Jumping facility
-Blockparty
  
The game was made in 50-60h in Unreal Engine. 
If you like it, feel free to leave a comment!
Sorry for the bad sprinting key. In Unreal Engine you can't use shift for Browser based games.
Sounds will be added in a few updates.
The game (And other games) are also available on my main website: CyberTimon
⠀
Since I am German, my website is in German. 
This version for Itch.io is of course in English! 
You can download the Windows 10 version here (English): FallMönsch Win10 Download
If you find bugs etc., feel free to write them in the comments.  
⠀
Have fun
